DOC.brief_summary: The investigator previously demonstrate utilizing validated tool , quality referral nurse practitioner ( NP ) physician assistant ( PA ) less referral physician . The investigator hypothesize local physician input , quality referral nurse practitioner physician assistant improve . This prospective study compare patient referral nurse practitioner physician assistant without prior discussion local physician .
DOC.brief_title: A Program Physician Supervision Improve Quality Patient Referrals From Nurse Practitioners Physician Assistants
DOC.criteria: All nurse practitioner physician assistant Mayo Clinic Health System
